alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 3:47PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Shelby and east central Jefferson Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 347 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greystone, or near Irondale, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Birmingham, Vestavia Hills, Homewood, Mountain Brook, Irondale, Leeds, Chelsea, Vincent, Five Points South, Vandiver, Barber Motorsports Park, U.A.B. Campus, Greystone, Inverness, Highland Lakes, Cahaba Heights, Regions Field, Fowler Lake, The Summit and Lake Purdy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
